codex v0.1.2025062

Usage: codex [command] [options]

Commands:
  exec            Execute a task non-interactively
  completion      Generate shell completions

Options:
  --json                         Output events as JSON
  -C, --cd <dir>                 Change working directory
  --sandbox <mode>               Sandbox mode: permissive, strict
  --ask-for-approval <policy>    Approval policy: always, never, auto
  --full-auto                    Auto approvals + sandbox
  --dangerously-bypass-approvals-and-sandbox
                                 Bypass all safety controls
  -v, --version                  Show version
  -h, --help                     Show this help
